Classes

QuantPlierBase.h File Reference

Base class for doing probe set quantification using either the PLIER (Probe Logarithmic Error Intensity Estimate) method or the ITER-PLIER method, which iteratively calls PLIER with the probes that best correlate with signal estimate. More...

#include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"

Classes

class  QuantPlierBase
 Base class for doing probe set quantification using either the PLIER (Probe Logarithmic Error Intensity Estimate) method or the ITER-PLIER method, which iteratively calls PLIER with the probes that best correlate with signal estimate. More...

Detailed Description

Base class for doing probe set quantification using either the PLIER (Probe Logarithmic Error Intensity Estimate) method or the ITER-PLIER method, which iteratively calls PLIER with the probes that best correlate with signal estimate.
